p.d: A Turkish-Albanian wedding What happens when two different cultures meet? Lejla Misini and Berhan Büklü prepare to celebrate their Turkish-Albanian wedding. The two Swiss, Caroline Kuhn and Denise Huber, medical assistants, help them organise the celebration. Will they manage to meet the challenge and live up to the hopes placed in them? Directed by: Susanne Heer, Christophe Bürge, Danielle Giuliani, (Switzerland, 2017)
